subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joel Ward scored the go-ahead goal with a little more than eight minutes left, and Ovechkin added a goal and an assist as the host Washington Capitals edged the Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2.
snippet: Joel Ward scored the go-ahead goal with a little more than eight minutes left, and Ovechkin added a goal and an assist as the host Washington Capitals edged the Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2.
